hero.title: Medical Tourism Excellence
hero.subtitle: World-class kidney care for international patients with seamless travel coordination

benefits.title: Global Access
benefits.text: Access world-class kidney care regardless of your location. Our international patient program brings expert medical treatment to patients from around the globe.

benefits.title: Cost-Effective Care
benefits.text: Receive high-quality medical care at competitive prices without compromising on quality or safety standards.

benefits.title: Expert Medical Team
benefits.text: Work with internationally recognized nephrologists and transplant surgeons with decades of experience.

benefits.title: Faster Treatment
benefits.text: Reduced waiting times compared to many countries, allowing you to receive timely care when you need it most.

healthGateways.title: Our Tourism Partner: Health Gateways
healthGateways.description: Health Gateways is our trusted medical tourism partner, dedicated to making your healthcare journey seamless and stress-free. They provide comprehensive support services to ensure international patients receive the best possible care and experience throughout their medical journey.

services.title: Travel Coordination
services.description: Comprehensive travel arrangements including flights, accommodation, and local transportation. Health Gateways ensures your journey is comfortable and well-organized.

services.title: Visa & Documentation
services.description: Expert assistance with visa applications, medical documentation, and all required paperwork. They handle the complex process so you can focus on your health.

services.title: Medical Coordination
services.description: Seamless coordination between your home country and our clinic for all medical needs, including pre-travel consultations, medical records transfer, and follow-up care.

services.title: 24/7 Support
services.description: Round-the-clock support in multiple languages to assist you throughout your journey, from initial inquiry to post-treatment follow-up.

services.title: Accommodation Services
services.description: Help with finding comfortable, convenient accommodation near the clinic, ensuring you're close to your medical care when needed.

services.title: Cultural Assistance
services.description: Support with language barriers, cultural adaptation, and local guidance to make your stay as comfortable and stress-free as possible.

process.title: Initial Consultation
process.description: Contact Health Gateways or our clinic directly. Our team will assess your medical needs and provide a comprehensive treatment plan.

process.title: Travel Planning
process.description: Health Gateways coordinates all travel arrangements, visa processing, and accommodation to ensure a smooth journey.

process.title: Medical Treatment
process.description: Receive world-class medical care from our expert team in state-of-the-art facilities with personalized attention.

process.title: Recovery & Follow-up
process.description: Post-treatment care and recovery support, with continued coordination for follow-up consultations and care.
